attributes.additional_details: We keep hearing about people who rape babies and attempted rape of babies and very young children. These are the sickest crimes you read about and it is about time our politicians woke up and put a full STOP to this evil crime! There is no place on this planet for such vile criminals. The government needs to wake up and introduce the death penalty to those who do serious harm to such defenceless, innocent, and very young human beings.
